pages.text: To get a quick start, place 2 chests, place an Item Retrieving Node next to a chest, and use Link Wand to link the node to another chest. To do this, right click the node first, and then right click the destination chest.$(br2)By default the node performs a transaction every 4 seconds, and each transaction transfers a stack. The beam will turn green when transaction succeed, or red when failed. The color will fade to grey as it cools down.
